body.instruction: Translate these sentences into English. Select the card to reveal the answer. Bona Fortuna!
body.instruction_textversion: Translate these sentences into English. Check your answer. Bona Fortuna!

back.content: Those men were able to return to the kingdom.
back.textversion:
Show Answer

Those men were able to return to the kingdom.

back.content: Those rocks are an impediment to us.
back.textversion:
Show Answer

Those rocks are an impediment to us.

front.content: In hoc modo, tempestas in maria venit.
front.textversion: In hoc modo, tempestas in maria venit.

back.content: In this manner, the storm came upon the seas.
back.textversion:
Show Answer

In this manner, the storm came upon the seas.

back.content: The inheritance from my grandfather was enjoyed immediately.
back.textversion:
Show Answer

The inheritance from my grandfather was enjoyed immediately.

back.content: Judgment will have been given to those patricians.
back.textversion:
Show Answer

Judgment will have been given to those patricians.
